channel.title: GTA ~ PSP Mods?
channel.description: Well, for pc you can gets mods for game (GTA), i was wondering if this is the case with psp? I hear you can but im not totally sure.

item.title: GTA ~ PSP Mods?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Frell you need a pandoras battery and a custom firmware psp.

Read full topic

item.title: GTA ~ PSP Mods?
item.dc:creator: @Anonyross_User Anonyross User
item.description:
@Anonyross_User wrote:

by modded i should probably point out that you dont have to do anything physicly to the psp, its a unofficial firmware upgrade, go to PSP Hacks and sign up, they are more than happy to help…

Read full topic

item.title: GTA ~ PSP Mods?
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

M33 is a group of PSP hackers, they put M33 on their firmwares. Downgrade from 3.40 with pandoras battery or if you have Lumines, or unpatched GTA Liberty City stories you can downgrade without problems.

Read full topic

item.title: GTA ~ PSP Mods?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Rajae, post:7, topic:176377”][quote author=Frell link=topic=237092.msg2017228#msg2017228 date=1201417996]

Well, this is how I moded GTA for PSP.

I upgrade to firmware 3.71M33 using pandora’s battery, and I put GTA on.
Then I put cheat device plugin onto my PSP, and it’s done.

Cheat device only works for firmware 2.6 and lower, or am i wrong?

No there’s a plugin for 3.71M33, I’ve had it before.

m33 is…?
[/quote]
M33 means a custom firmware PSP, meaning you can run burned games and such. My method only works for moded PSP’s (M33)

What PSP are you using?[/quote]
v 3.40 no custom fm

Read full topic

item.title: GTA ~ PSP Mods?
item.dc:creator: @Rajae Rajae

Well, this is how I moded GTA for PSP.

Then I put cheat device plugin onto my PSP, and it’s done.

Cheat device only works for firmware 2.6 and lower, or am i wrong?

No there’s a plugin for 3.71M33, I’ve had it before.
[/quote]
m33 is…?[/quote]
M33 means a custom firmware PSP, meaning you can run burned games and such. My method only works for moded PSP’s (M33)

What PSP are you using?

Read full topic

item.title: GTA ~ PSP Mods?
item.dc:creator: @Rajae Rajae
item.description:
@Rajae wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:4, topic:176377”][quote author=Rajae link=topic=237092.msg2017206#msg2017206 date=1201417592]
Well, this is how I moded GTA for PSP.

I upgrade to firmware 3.71M33 using pandora’s battery, and I put GTA on.
Then I put cheat device plugin onto my PSP, and it’s done.
[/quote]
Cheat device only works for firmware 2.6 and lower, or am i wrong?[/quote]
No there’s a plugin for 3.71M33, I’ve had it before.

It’s here
http://www.cheatdevice.com/
A zip is located on there, and one of the version histories say
v2.4:
3.10OE-A and higher and 3.71 M33 supported!

Read full topic
